questiontext.text: Open the sheet mnist from the file at https://github.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/blob/main/rexams/data/excel-example.xlsx?raw=true using rio::import(https://github.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/blob/main/rexams/data/excel-example.xlsx?raw=true, which = "mnist") (or else you can download the file to your computer and open with read_excel()). How many rows are there in this file?

Open the sheet P_Troglodytes from the file at https://github.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/blob/main/rexams/data/excel-example.xlsx?raw=true using rio::import(https://github.com/eugene100hickey/ATU-2023/blob/main/rexams/data/excel-example.xlsx?raw=true, which = "P_Troglodytes") (or else you can download the file to your computer and open with read_excel()). How many rows are there in this file?
